name: substrate
description: These are keys that are always available to the runtime implementation

items.name: changesTrieConfig(): `u32`
items.summary: Changes trie configuration is stored under this key.

items.name: extrinsicIndex(): `u32`
items.summary: Current extrinsic index (u32) is stored under this key.

items.name: heapPages(): `u64`
items.summary: Number of wasm linear memory pages required for execution of the runtime.
